name: The Clarence Chest
description: Elegance with just a hint of glamour is the essence of the Clarence, which would sit perfectly in any sumptuous boudoir. Favouring the sweeping curves of a cylindrical shape over the harsh lines and strict angles of most contemporary designs, this beautiful bedside table reinterprets a more traditional silhouette and makes it something unique and timeless. The radial pattern to the chest top, yet again proof of DAVIDSON's impeccable craftsmanship, is the most gorgeous of finishing touches, a celebration of the natural material, as well as traditional craft techniques. DAVIDSON is delighted to be able to provide a custom service and the Clarence is available in a finish of your choosing, according to your design preference and desired look. The handles are finished here in a gleaming polished nickel, the final tone in a palette of distinct and beautiful colours and textures. DAVIDSON also offers the option of handles finished in nickel or brass, for an alternative look.
